title: [已弃坑][1.7.10][ssp/smp]Trapcraft 陷阱mod（新增汉化！）
author: cyll
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyll 于 2016-8-12 17:16 编辑 

[fly]汉化！！！
！（只有1.7.2和1.7.10）[/fly]
第一次搬运mod如果不符合格式，请说明。更新列表
Update List Key
(+) A new feature(-) A removed feature(#) A changed feature(*) A bug fix(/) Otherv2.2.1a* Fixed items not stacking when going into the magnetic chest* Fixed items sometimes not getting pulled towards the magnetic chestv2.2.0aUpdated to MC 1.7.2 - Note back up your worlds before updating, proberbly it will not be compatible with worlds that prevoius used this mod# The dummy now doesn't move at all when being hit* When creating a dummy in creative, it no longer uses the head item up.v2.1.0aUpdated to MC 1.6.2# Made the Igniter gui be more intelligent about where shift clicked items go* Fixed a bug where you could lose items in the Igniter gui by shift clickingv2.0.4a+ Added a version checker. It will tell you when a new version is available and tell you the download link.* Fixed crashing when a mob stands on the bear trap (forgot to put some files in the last download of the mod)v2.0.3a# Removed logging details for every tick the igniter was in the world. (Will reduce lag)# Made it so you can right click on the bear trap when is is not active and it not count as a right click.* Fixed crashing opon opening the magnetic chest.v2.0.2aUpdated to MC 1.5.1+ Igniter can now be rotated like a piston and will place fire in the direction it is facing.+ New Igniter gui.+ Added a igniter range upgrade which can be put into the gui and will increase the distance the igniter places the fire away from it.+ Added the bear trap. Traps mobs slowing them down and does damage to them.# Magnetic chests no longer make double chests, they can only be a single chest and can be placed next to each other.# Grass coverings inventory item is now 2d so you can see it better.# Magnetic chests now make the chest sound when opening and closing# Changed the crafting recipe for igniters.# Removed the dummy head, to create the dummy now use a vanilla human head.  The crafting recipe for the vanilla human head is the same as the dummy head before hand.# Removed the Trapcraft creative tab and put everything in the redstone creative tab.* Fixed a crash when you re spawned with magnetic chests.* Fixed the fan in the inventory not having the wooden fan in the picture.* Fixed the dummy not dropping anything on death.v2.0.0a & v2.0.1a ---REMOVED---v1.0.0 + First Release

傀儡
意义不明的合成方式



[wood]
[wood]当把头放在上时可以形成下图
作用：勾引敌人攻击自己
血量：20
点火器合成方式： 
当有红石驱动时喷出火焰
点火器装备合成方式可放入点火器中

 作用：增加点火的距离，一个可以增加一个格距离@1164816764 提供[spoiler]
夹子[spoiler]合成方式当有生物走过时夹住，禁止移动，并持续扣血，不排除逃脱的可能磁力箱合成方式吸引掉落的方块风扇合成方式当有红石驱动时，吹走物品或生物
刺钉当有生物靠近或站在上面时会扣血草覆盖版合成方式当有生物站在上面时，消失并获得2个木棒与土地无区别但是踩上去会掉落对于下面的朋友，对不起，我不小心手贱提前按发帖了
请按版本安装
